title: UAE’s Classics Campaign Sputters Without Pogačar’s Punch: ‘We Miss Tadej in Every Race’
content:
No big result for UAE in Omloop or Kuurne without Pogačar, but riders believe they're on schedule for a big spring classics: 'We can’t win everything.'

Read the full article at UAE’s Classics Campaign Sputters Without Pogačar’s Punch: ‘We Miss Tadej in Every Race’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
